Posts.Title: Just diagnosed - tired of crying, ready to get on with it! lighthouselady bcisnofun

Posts.Content: Aug 26, 2013 11:43PM Cutiekool wrote: Hello ladies, It's been a few days. Update. 1st chemo August 19th. A/c. S/E. fatigue, nausea and funky mouth. I have been having a lot of nausea and acid reflex. Today is the first day I really feel like eating. Has anyone else had that white pasty feeling in mouth? If so what did you do for it? Talked with onco nurse, she said possibly thrush..... See onco tomorrow. Also does anyone have extreme Sensitivity in the feet? Please tell me next round will not be as harsh....... Take care. I love reading all your posts. ;)
